name: Pinion 2 - The Distal Reach
description:
Having escaped the walls of a city with an overbearing presence you are finally free.

But your freedom comes at a cost. The Distal Guardians are in pursuit and your time to truely escape is running out, literally.

You must undo the effects of the Slowstun Device you've triggered and find the so-called Feathers - Towers that provide command over the Distal Guardians.

Undo the effects of the Slowstun and reverse this back onto the Guardians themselves. Finally free yourself beyond the watchful eyes and control of this lockdown city.
